message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm asking for $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering what you'll gain from it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $9,000?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $9,000. I am sticking to my original offer of $8,000. Is there any way we could come to an agreement?
